# Needed Skip needs at least two files to work:
## An XML file Any [[plain text]] and [[markup]] between two lines of XML, saved with the extension `.xml`.
<?xml-stylesheet type="text/xsl" href="0.xsl"?><x> CONTENT </x>
## The Skip file `0.xsl` The XSLT file that processes [[markup|page content]] into HTML.
# Optional An option CSS file can style the pages beyond the browser's default styling.
